alert.note: Alert for Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 3:08PM CDT until May 27 at 7:22AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls affecting Chase County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River near Florence affecting Marion County. Cottonwood River near Plymouth affecting Lyon and Chase Counties. For the Cottonwood River...including Florence, Cottonwood Falls, Plymouth...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River near Florence. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Outside the levee system in southeast Florence, flood waters flow across Park Ave Road and reach the foundation of a residential home. Northwest of Florence, the bridge on 140th Road and 1/2 mile west of Highway 77 floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 23.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 4.4 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Cottonwood River Florence 22.0 23.1 Thu 2 pm CDT 12.3 5.4 4.7 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
